resources.string: Access Control Allow Origin, Content Security Policy (CSP), Cross Domain Meta Policy, Server Information, UTF-8 Character Encoding, X-Frame-Options (XFO), X-Powered-By, X-XSS-Protection, X-Content-Type-Options, X-Download-Options, X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies, HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS),Secure Cookies, X-Pingback
